籤詩版本二:
Umugqa wegolide ukala inhliziyo yakho, akukho ukuncipha, akukho ukwanda, akukho isisindo
Unenhliziyo eqotho kukho konke ukuphila kwakhe, futhi izihloko zakhe zonke zikhanya futhi ubuciko bakhe bugqamile.U-Bei ubhekisela ku-Beizi njengegugu. I-Bei inamathuluzi.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele inhliziyo ezolile neqondile.
Konke kuzinzile futhi ngaphandle kwengozi.
解曰: Ukuthula kwengqondo nobuqotho. Ekugcineni, ukuthula nokuthula. Vele ulandele umsebenzi wakho. Umhlaba unokuthula.
籤詩故事一:
◇Jinjing ihlola Douer
U-Dou Yanshan wenza izenzo ezinhle futhi waqongelela ubuhle, futhi wazala amadodana amahlanu, wonke azuza impumelelo. UNkulunkulu wayefuna ukuhlola enye yamadodana akhe, u-Dou Yi, futhi wathumela umoya wegolide owawuzifihle njengentombazane ukuze uyenge u-Dou Yi, kodwa u-Dou Yi akazange anyakaze. emhlabathini futhi bathola ingothi yegolide.
(Le ndaba isingathekiso semizwa ka-Dou Yi, hhayi yesilingo socansi.)
聖意: Umkhaya → Uphephele wena → Funa ingcebo → Hlakulela lapho uhweba → Umshado ozinzile → Hlanganisa iLiujia → Abahamba ngezinyawo besilisa → Iba nezikelemu zamaShintian → Imfuyo ezinzile → Thola abantu ngokuthula → Lindela icala → Ukufuduka ngokuthula → Gcina impahla elahlekile → Bona ukugulan → Jingxing → isicaba
